title: Esther Perel
itunes:title: Esther Perel
itunes:subtitle: World-renowned psychotherapist, New York Times best-selling author, podcast host, Fortune 500 consultant and modern relationship expert Esther Perel joins Anna to co-host this episode. Esther talks with Anna about how languages can be a lens into relation
description:
World-renowned psychotherapist, New York Times best-selling author, podcast host, Fortune 500 consultant and modern relationship expert Esther Perel joins Anna to co-host this episode. Esther talks with Anna about how languages can be a lens into relationships, listening, legacy, questions to ask an unfaithful partner, and more.

Our Unqualified segment begins with a call from Victoria who is afraid her relationship is being affected as she deals with overwhelming stress from recent life changes. Anna and Esther then talk with Rose who, after having been in a loving relationship with her college sweetheart for seven years, isn’t satisfied with the only physical relationship either of them have ever known.

If you have a question and would like to talk with Anna, please reach out! Go to: unqualified.com/talk-with-anna

Skylight Frames Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go to SkylightFrame.com and enter code FARIS. 

Best Fiends Download Best Fiends FREE today on the App Store or Google Play. That’s friends, without the r—Best Fiends.

Masterclass This holiday, give one annual membership and get one free! Go to MASTERCLASS.com/ANNA today. Terms apply.

The Pill Club Right now, when you go to THEPILLCLUB.COM/UNQUALIFIED The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to Bedsider.org for every Anna Faris Is Unqualified listener who becomes a patient. Your donation will help low-income individuals get access to birth control through Bedsider.org. Get your first birth control care package and donate to help more women in need of affordable birth control.

State Farm Like a good neighbor State Farm is there.  Call or go to Statefarm.com for a quote today.

BetterHelp BetterHelp is customized online therapy that offers video, phone and even live chat sessions with your therapist, so you don’t have to see anyone on camera if you don’t want to. It’s much more affordable than in-person therapy and you can be matched with a therapist in under 48 hours. Anna Faris listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/FARIS

Audible Now’s the time to listen together. Go to audible.com/listentogether - Listen now. Only from Audible.

Researcher: Margot Barrett
